definition: off season/slow business season/see also 旺季[wang4 ji4]
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields

sentences.english: Like losing him is why this off-season is screwed up.
sentences.chinese: 好像失去他就是这个淡季搞砸了的原因了。

sentences.english: A tourist attraction have any off-season and peak seasons.
sentences.chinese: 任何一个旅游景点都有淡季和旺季之分。

sentences.english: Is there a lot of slack in the road-building sector?
sentences.chinese: 道路建设行业会有很多的淡季吗？

sentences.english: Plane reservations for New Zealand are cheaper when you go out of season.
sentences.chinese: 淡季时订纽西兰的机位较便宜。

sentences.english: Torso stretches help you to cool down after a football off-season workout.
sentences.chinese: 躯干延伸帮你冷静下来后，一个足球淡季锻炼。

sentences.english: Hotel workers wait until the off-season to take their holidays.
sentences.chinese: 旅馆工作人员等到淡季再休假。

sentences.english: " off-season commerce reserve manages chemical fertilizer method " announce.
sentences.chinese: 《化肥淡季商业储备治理办法》公布。

sentences.english: Purchasethem in the off season when you'll be able to get genuine pairs at discountprices.
sentences.chinese: 在淡季时你可以以折扣价拿到正品。

sentences.english: It also can fulfill the requirement of human for high level fresh vegetable in spring and winter ;
sentences.chinese: 能够满足冬春淡季人们对高档鲜菜的需求。

sentences.english: Ghosts are good for business. Especially in the off-season.
sentences.chinese: 闹鬼益旺财，特别是淡季。

sentences.english: I'll never come to Monte Carlo out of season again.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不在淡季得时候来蒙特卡罗了。

sentences.english: Especially in buying and selling off-season, more to drive every clinch a deal opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 特别是在买卖淡季，更要驾御每个成交的机遇。

sentences.english: The off-season too much of life, should strive to harvest.
sentences.chinese: 人生的淡季太多了，收获的时候就该力争。

sentences.english: The highest level of 2, doing business is not short off-season, the season more prosperous.
sentences.chinese: 做生意的最高境界是淡季不淡，旺季更旺。

sentences.english: He went to sea at 16, and, in the off-season, to school to study fishing.
sentences.chinese: 他16岁出海捕鱼，在淡季则去学校学习捕鱼知识。

sentences.english: No word if they'll be offering rides during the off-season.
sentences.chinese: 没有报道说在登山淡季是否提供乘坐服务。

definition: busy season/peak period/see also 淡季[dan4 ji4]
Golden Week, two 7-day national holiday periods
to appreciate (in value)/to increase in price
FIT (free independent traveler)/individual traveler (as opposed to traveling with a group)
